ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: return to your Lord, well-pleasing and well-pleased!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and well-pleasing Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Return to your Lord well-pleased (with your blissful destination), well-pleasing (to your Lord).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: return to your Lord well pleased with him and He will be pleased with you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Return towards your Lord – you being pleased with Him, and He pleased with you!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Come back to your Lord, -- well-pleased and well-pleasing!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Return to your Lord, well-pleased (with him), well-pleasing (Him),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: return unto thy Lord, well-pleased, well-pleasing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Return unto thy Lord, content in His good pleasure!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: return to your Lord, well-pleased, well-pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Return Unto thine Lord well pleased and well-pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Return to your Lord, pleased and pleasing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Come back thou to thy Lord,- well pleased (thyself), and well-pleasing unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Come back to your Lord, Well-pleased (yourself) and well-pleasing unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: return to your Lord wellpleased, wellpleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Return to your Lord, pleased and accepted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:28] Return — this is said to it upon death — to your Lord, that is to say, return to His command and to His will, pleased, with the reward, pleasing, in God’s sight with your deeds; in other words [return O soul] combining both descriptions (both of which are circumstantial qualifiers). And it will be said to it at the Resurrection:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Return unto thy Lord) return to that which Allah has prepared for you in the Garden; and it is also said this means: return to your master: the body, (content) with Allah's reward (in His good pleasure) because of its belief in Allah's divine Oneness!
